## PR Type

What kind of change does this PR introduce?

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no API changes)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code style update (formatting, renaming)
- [ ] Build/CI related changes
- [ ] Other (please describe):

Provide a clear and concise description of the changes in this PR.

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `dart analyze --fatal-infos` and it passes with zero errors/warnings
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] This PR contains no breaking changes (or breaking changes are documented)
- [ ] I have reviewed my own code before requesting review
- [ ] I have added comments to code in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have followed the Boy Scout Rule (left code better than I found it)
